page.title: 07Refreshment Places
page.content: There are a lot of refreshment places and most of them are public houses. Only one is a coffee shop.The public houses have facilities for children. They are usually swings and climbing frames or roundabouts. Here are list of places where you can eat out.Where it says 'children' it means there are facilities for children; {The Three Tuns.}'children' {The Lamb Inn. } 'children' {The Crown Inn.} 'children' {The Carpenter's. Arms 'children' {The fisherman's. Haunt 'children' {The coffee Shop.
